![](../../img/news/number8.png){fig-align="center" width=400px}

The eighth session of the ABC (Accessible Bioinformatics Cafe) will be **on november 7th, at 13:00-15:00 in building 1253-317**

![Building 1253 on AU campus](../../img/news/1253-317.png){width=400px}

Everyone is welcome to **join independently of coding skills and level**. 

## Agenda
 
For this ABC we host a workshop by Nygen Analytics, which will give a live demo of a downstream analysis with their interactive tool for single cell datasets.

The tool has a free tier account with up to 5 single cell datasets uploaded.
 
## Signing up

Please sign up to ensure there is enough cake (and you are pretty sure you will show up): click on the button below to give us a heads up of your presence. Don't do it multiple times to cheat for extra cake!
